name: 33" Pooper Scooper 2 Pack, XL Tall Handle No Touch Dog Pooper Scooper for Large Small Dogs, Durable Spring & Lightweight, Large Pooper Scooper for Dogs Heavy Duty, Portable Dog Poop Pick Up Tool
short_description: One Purchase Get 2: Pooper Scooper 33" XL hands away from poop smell. Buy two 33-inch items for under $14 each– Great savings compared to buying one! Two different attractive colors keep you in a good mood while cleaning.

New Upgraded Products: Extra Length Hand design than old one. We pay attention to your needs, especially design a longer and bigger pooper scooper for large dogs. No bending and can reach the dog poop from farther away, reducing stinky smell.

Why buy 2 PCS？ If dog pooper scooper suddenly breaks, or no time to clean it, what could use for the next walk? A wise owner will always keep two, one for use, one as a backup, so you will never have any worries.

Easy Use: No assembly needed, easy to lock or unlock and portable, easy to use, carry, and store. Dog poop goes into the dog poop scooper and your hand won't touch poop. Placed one poop scooper in the door for any time dog walk. Another take in the trunk of the car for a sudden urge to go outdoors.

Easy to Clean: TIMINGILA Dog Pooper Scooper meets your expectations to clean up pet waste, no more feeling of poop in your hand. Clean Poop pooper picker just by washing off with the hose, helps you pick up pets poop and release the mess cleanly. Plastic material is rust-free and lightweight, lasts for years.A good choice for households with more than one dog.

short_description: 【PORTABLE AND COMPACT】XPAPOV dog poop scoop features a compact design in the shape of a tube and comes with a special lanyard that allows you to carry the scooper with ease. Ideal for walking, dog park, trips, hiking, shopping or outdoor activities

【Built-in Waste Bag Dispenser】Made of premium ABS and PP plastic material, it features a built-in bag dispenser, you don’t have to stuff the bags into your pocket, just take one out of it when your dog poops

name: Niubya Pooper Scooper for Dogs, Metal Poop Scooper Tray and Rake Set with Adjustable Long Handle, Dog Pooper Scooper for Pet Waste Removal
short_description: Full-featured Cleaning Kit: Include a set of tray and rake. You can clean efficiently the pet poop in grass, courtyard, flat and other places with them. Upgrade Clip-on Interlocking ensures the connection of handles is more reliable to prevent spinning or easily loose off.

Adjustable Ergonomic Handle: Each handle consists of three sections, and the maximum length can reach 37.8 inches. You can adjust the length of the handle based on your own personal needs. Makes it convenient for people of all heights to use, as you won’t need to bend down to use it.

Lightweight and Durable Construction: The handle is made of premium stainless steel, and a plastic sleeve is installed on the top. The rake and tray are treated with antirust coating. So there’s no need to worry about using your new scoop in wet or stormy weather.

Easy to clean and Store: Comes with a non-stick surface that makes cleaning a breeze. Treated with non-stick coating. This poop scooper set is very easy to clean, just hose off when the chores are done. The handle can be easily detached to make storage easy and also save space.

name: 32 inch Pooper Scooper for Large Dogs – Long Handle Dog Poop Scooper for Yard, No Bending Save Back, Ease of Pickup, Grass Friendly, Sturdiness
short_description: 🌿 Clean Without Bending — Protect Your Back: Designed with a 32" long handle, this dog poop scooper lets you clean up while standing upright. Ideal for tall users, seniors, post-surgery recovery, or anyone with back or knee pain.
🌿 Easy One-Hand Operation, Strong Grip: High-tension dual springs deliver a tight, reliable grip while staying easy to squeeze. Comfortable for daily use by women, seniors, and first-time dog owners.

🌿 Handles Large Dog Waste — One Scoop at a Time: Wide jaw opening with serrated + flat teeth securely grabs large dog waste in one pick-up. Designed for clean, controlled scooping—not oversized baskets that spill or wobble.
🌿 Works on Grass, Gravel, Mulch & More: Dual-tooth design lifts waste cleanly from grass, gravel, sand, rocks, and concrete—without damaging your lawn or leaving residue behind.
🌿 Durable, Non-Stick & Easy to Rinse Clean: Made from heavy-duty, eco-friendly materials with a non-stick surface. Rinses clean in seconds, resists odor buildup, and holds up to daily yard use.
🌿 Foldable for Storage, Ready When You Need It: Folds down for compact storage at home or in your car. Great for yards, kennels, and occasional travel—always within reach when cleanup calls.

name: DogBuddy Pooper Scooper, Portable Dog Pooper Scooper, Poop Scooper for Small and Large Dogs, Pooper Scooper With Bag Attachment, Leash Clip and Dog Waste Bags Included (Medium, Kiwi)
short_description: Stress-Free Cleanup - Enjoy a cleaner, more hygienic way to clean up after your dog. DogBuddy Pooper Scooper removes waste from any surface, keeps your hands clean and your walks enjoyable. Its easy-to-use design makes it a perfect tool that even kids can use.

Designed for All Dogs – It doesn’t matter if you have a small terrier or a large labrador. Our dog pooper scooper is available in two sizes and features an extendable backside to accommodate waste from dogs of all sizes.
Built to Last - Our dog poop scooper's sturdy construction and premium materials ensure durability for the daily use in the yard or on walks.

Convenience on the Go - Our pooper scooper's easy-to-use design allows quick cleanups while walking your dog. For best results set it up before leaving for a walk. This poop scooper hooks on a leash, so you won't forget it and you won't have to carry it.

All-in-One Solution – Our pooper scooper has built-in bag attachment. Use any standard rolls for size Medium and DogBuddy Jumbo Refill Bags for size Large. You can use the poop scooper as the dog poop bag holder until you get to the garbage bin.

DogBuddy: Established in 2016 in Seattle, we’re a small family business with big love for dogs. Every product is designed from scratch with love and care and tested by our own pups. We’re here for you anytime 24/7 if you have any questions—unless we’re out walking the dogs (they’re the real bosses!).

name: Pooper Scooper Swivel Bin & Rake with 100 Waste Bags, Dog Pooper Scooper with Bag Attachment for Large Medium Small Dogs, Poop Scooper with Lid for Lawn Yard Dog Kennel
short_description: Convenient Swivel Bin and Rake Design - Our swivel bin and rake are crafted with your convenience in mind, for easy and efficient scooping of pet waste. Bid farewell to those tiresome moments of bending over and fumbling to scoop up your furry pal's little accidents. The specially engineered swivel bin allows for a smooth and efficient scooping motion, making the task quick and effortless.

No more bending over or stooping down to pick up your pet’s waste - This 36.6inches long handle dog pooper scooper allows you to pick up waste without having to bend down.The extended handle allows you to maintain an upright posture while reaching the waste, reducing strain on your back and knees. Making it more comfortable and convenient to use.

Odor-blocking lid helps to contain and minimize unpleasant smells - One of the most notable features of our pooper scooper set is its odor-blocking lid. No more dealing with unpleasant odors wafting through the air as you clean. The lid securely seals in the waste, ensuring no odor escape and leaving your surroundings fresh and inviting.

Easy & Sanitary Clean-Up with Poop Bags. With our 100 bags and clip, setup is a breeze in just seconds: ①Opening up the dog waste bag and placing it inside the bucket.②Take hold of the edges of the bag and gather them up.③ Gathered edges of the bag in your hand, wrap them around the clip securely.

Compact and Lightweight for On the Go Lifestyles - We know your life is busy and full of adventures with your furry sidekick. That's why our pooper scooper set is designed to be as compact and lightweight as a feather. It tucks away neatly in your garage or shed, taking up hardly any space. And when it's time for a walk in the park or a road trip, it's the perfect travel companion. You'll always be ready to keep things clean and tidy, no matter where your journey takes you. Please note:To prevent long-term high temperature damage, do not place the manure scoop under direct sunlight for a long time.
